/usr/bin/g++ -g CMakeFiles/my_first_simulation.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_first_simulation.dir/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/my_first_simulation.dir/src/shaderClass.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_first_simulation.dir/src/VAO.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_first_simulation.dir/src/VBO.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_first_simulation.dir/src/EBO.cpp.o -o my_first_simulation  -lglfw /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so
